item.title: Aurreum released the industry's most reliable cloud data management platform.
item.description: Aurreum, a rising star in the field of multi-cloud data management, released its self-developed Cloud Data Protection Services today. This service will help enterprises effectively protect data in the cloud, avoid data loss, defend against Ransomware attacks, and achieve simple and unified cloud data management. The rise of multi-cloud creates a transformative infrastructure. However, customers own the security, protection, compliance, and availability of their data within the cloud as part of a shared responsibility model with the cloud service provider (CSP).
